channel.title: I'd like to learn
channel.description: How to make my own private server and stuff. I'm an admin on 15 servers, yet I can't help code any of them because I don't know how. Fancy talk and sucking up will only get me so far ya know. So, I'd like to learn how to code. And don't try and teach me all of it at once, I have trouble picking up new words like "java" and "format" and "the". So, if someone out there is feeling particularly helpful tonight, could someone teach me the ways of the honorable coder-san?

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @one_uglybird one uglybird
item.description:
@one_uglybird wrote:

Delete this plz, The mod said he couldn’t move it at first on PM but turns out he could, so delete this one, and keep the other 1 up plz thx =p[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 09:49:04 PM[/size][hr]rarescape, plz don’t start, every1 was screaming and yelling at me on the rs2 server tutorials forum when I originally posted this there so plz, don’t start, I’ve got a headache…

Read full topic

item.title: I'd like to learn
item.dc:creator: @rarescape rarescape
item.description:
@rarescape wrote:

UMMMMMMMMMMMMMM…Read Miss Silabsoft’s code help sticky on about codeing, and, I can’t help you much there…
